FuncDef:
The email command sets the email address of the entity.
The undo email command deletes the email address of the entity.
By default, no email address exists for the entity.

ParaDef.Info:
Indicates the email address of the entity.
It is a string of 1 to 31 case sensitive characters.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
email-address is used to describe an entity.
